Title: Brokenhouse WPF Control Suite
Description: The Brokenhouse Control Suite is library that provides a rich set of controls for the Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF). It provides a full featured transition control as well as WPF replacements for the standard windows Wizards and Task dialogs.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
The Brokenhouse Control Suite is library that provides a rich set of controls for the Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF). It provides a full featured transition control as well as WPF replacements for the standard windows Wizards and Task dialogs.


I have recently moved this project onto git hub https://github.com/gatter/wpf-controls with the aim or restarting development to support newer versions of Visual Studio.
